name: dice+
description:
Virtual dice for 1 or 2 players. Customize the number of dice per player, rolls per turn, and the number of sides of a die (an value from 2 to 100). Select which dice to hold and which to roll.

Great for playing your favorite variants of farkle or Yahtzee, and perfect when you can't find the dice for your favorite board game. Or use it to pick a random number between 1 and 100.

Very responsive and simple to use.

Up to 10 dice per player for iPad and 8 dice per player on iPhone/iPod Touch.
